sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-list dense>
    <v-list-item v-for="task in tasks" :key="task.id">
      <v-card class="elevation-3 rounded-lg task-card" flat>
        <v-card-body>
          <v-card-title>{{ task.title }}</v-card-title>
          <v-card-subtitle>{{ task.description }}</v-card-subtitle>
        </v-card-body>
      </v-card>
    </v-list-item>
  </v-list>
</template>


<script>
export default {
  name: 'TaskCard',
  props: {
    task: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style>
.v-card-title,
.v-card-subtitle {
  display: block; /* Garante que ambos sejam blocos e apareçam um abaixo do outro */
}

.elevation-3 {
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 6px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 0px 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.07);
}

.rounded-lg {
  border-radius: 12px; /* Ajuste o raio conforme necessário */
}

.task-card {
  width: 300px; /* Largura fixa */
  background-color: white; /* Fundo branco */
}
</style>
